name: hyperapp
description: The tiny framework for building hypertext applications
author: Jorge Bucaran

scripts.build: env dir=${pkg:+pkg/$pkg/} out=$npm_package_name${pkg:+.$pkg}.js npm run minify
scripts.create: npm run build && git commit -am $msg && git tag -s $msg -m $msg && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release: env msg=$(npm run -s message) npm run create && cd ${pkg:+pkg/$pkg} && npm publish --access public
